message_1:
What is the correlation coefficient between the height and weight of a group of 30 students, given the following data: 

- The average height of the students is 165cm with a standard deviation of 5cm.
- The average weight of the students is 60kg with a standard deviation of 10kg.
- The correlation between height and weight is 0.7.
message_2: The correlation coefficient between the height and weight of the group of 30 students is already given in the problem statement. It is 0.7.
